thread.title: Fog and poor visibility warning in UAE
thread.title_full: Fog and poor visibility warning in UAE

title: Fog and poor visibility warning in UAE
text:
Fog and poor visibility warning in UAE Web Team Filed on February 27, 2017 | Last updated on February 27, 2017 at 07.38 am Share Vote 
(Khaleej Times) The NCMS has issued a warning of fog formation and poor visibility during the morning rush hour. The National Center of Meteorology & Seismology (NCMS) has issued a warning of fog formation and poor visibility of less than 100 metres over some parts of UAE. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 27, 2017 Motorists have been advised to practice caution and drive carefully if fog gathers to avoid any accidents. Fog was experienced in parts of Al Ain, Abu Dhabi, Dubai in the ealry hours of the morning. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 27, 2017 According to the latest weather updates, the day will be cloudy in general with chance of rain during the mornings. The relative humidity will increase during night and early mornings over some internal and coastal areas.
